content.detailedDescription:
As i drove down the highway i noticed these 5 red lights in the sky directly in font of me. i turned to my friend to see if she noticed them and told me she had. we watched them as we drove down the highway, noticing that three of the lights started moving. as we drove the object was now behind us, being lost in the distance.  
 
i was immediately excited by the event and noticed in the next few days it was reported in the papers and seen by others, but in the papers it was dismissed as flares. now i am a fan of the ufo hunters show and have seen demonstrations of this theory and i now what i saw where not flares. 

i know this is a short story, but i still would like an investigator to call me. 
thank you for your time
content.summary: While driving down highway rt. 24, i saw  5 strange red lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Disc with shiny top shows up on phoenix cam more at webcamufo.Com
content.summary: Disc with shiny top shows up on phoenix cam more at webcamufo.Com.

content.detailedDescription: I was test driving a truck with my wife in the begining of january at around 8pm when i saw a object heading at tremendous speed to my left when it disappeared.   the object was very bright, large, and moving fast with no sound.   i have been around many air shows when jets go supersonic and can tell from experience that this object was moving faster with no supersonic boom or any other sound to follow.  it also disappeared out while traveling at this fast rate.   i also want to make a note that this object was traveling horizontal to the earths surface.  it did not have the slightest downward angle, when i saw it i wanted to assume it was a meteor coming into the earths atmosphere but with such a horizontal flight pattern i had to rule it out.   it was also quite large.  after the incident i asked my wife if she had seen it and she confirmed.   i didn't want to believe in any of this until i saw the channel 6 report.   please post some answers....  possible military classified airplane?
content.summary: Un real....

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a few landscape pictures for some research on native american sites that i want to investigate in the spring. so i pulled off the road and snapped a few pictures of a farmers field that i believe may have some potential as a future reference site on a book i want to write in the future.  after a few shots, i turned to get back into my truck and something very very bright caught my attention out of the corner of my eye, so i turned and looked. i saw a round,oval white light in the field where i had just taken a picture. i still had the camera in my hand and snapped another picture almost in the exact local of the previous picture.  i had no sooner taken the picture, (mabe 2-3 seconds at most), and the object i had photographed flew straight up at an amazing speed, so fast that by the time i brought the camera back to my face for another picture, it had vanished.  i stayed there for quite awhile after that hoping to see it again, but never did see anything else.
i went home as fast as i could to download it onto my computer. it took me forever to do, because i'm not very computer savy and needed to download the program that would let me view the pictures. once i did get the pictures onto my computer, my son and i started to view them with the magnifying glass to enlarge them. what we saw, amazed both of us. in the first picture, you could see there were objects in the sky off in the distance, one being rectangular in shape. the second picture shows several objects in the sky, only this time closer than the first. one seemed to even have some kind of trail behind it. on the third picture, (the one with the bright object), you can see there are other objects above it.
in the first two pictures i took, i saw nothing as i took them, (only later when i looked at them on my computer did i see the things in the sky). however i do know that before the third picture, i did see something physically emitting a very bright white light near the ground, at which time i took the picture. then it just went up so fast, it just vanished from sight. i have no idea what i saw, but i know it was something i have never seen before in my life. i still cant get over how fast this thing was. i have been feeling like i'm running on adrenaline since seeing the object. it's now 1:30 am of the 28th, and i still can't get to bed. please feel free to contact me about this sighting, as i am at a loss to explain what i saw. your help and insight would be greatly appreciated. i just want to know i'm not going crazy. mabe someone else has seen something similar to this, and i would love to talk to them if possible.
the other question you asked is : what did i think the object was when i saw it. i can honestly say in my 51 years, i've never seen anything like it, so i do remember i kept thinking,"what the heck is that, what could that possibly be.
content.summary: I had taken my new camera out to get landscape pics, after a few pics, i was turning to get back into my truck, and a bright white light caught my attention, which i took a photo of as soon as i took the picture it went straight up at an incredible speed.

content.detailedDescription: while outside in the front yard my wife and i noticed a lear jet doing a let turn over our house approx. 1200 ft. in alt. thats when i noticed a refection off to my right at approx 5000 to 8000 ft. in alt. and approx. 3 to 5 miles distant. the sky was cloudless and clear visabilty.  there were three objects flying patterns toward the south east of my location, at first i thought it was seaguls but after observing them the sun was reflecting of the bottom of the objects as they manuvered indicating a metalic structure.  the objects were oval in shape approx 50ft. in size, they were two toned with a silver bottom and light blue or sky blue on top.  two objects were doing circular patters a rather wide pattern and one object doing a complete circular pattern around the other two objects and at times that one object would fly in between the two that were doing the circular patterns.  while observing the objects they seem to disappear from view and then reappear.  i noticed that the objects were flipping on to their sides as if using the sky blue color of their top to blend into the sky or back gound. and as they reappeared the sun would reflect off of their silver color bottom and became visable. while the objects were doing their manuvers one object would at times go to the north rather quickly and then disappear and the reappear and then it stopped and flew to the south to join the others.  after about 15 mins of observation the three objects formed up into a lazy "v" pattern and quickly departed south toward new mexico. during the time of observation there were no aircraft other than the lear jet that flew over us.  the city airport is approx 4 miles from our location.
content.summary: Three objects, two doing circular patterns and one object  flying in between them.

content.detailedDescription:
to whom it may concern,

 first of all, let it be known that i am not a ufo "believer" per say.

 although this occurred approximately 27 years ago, i thought it's time to report to various ufo investigation organizations. i hope this is worthy.
 thank you.

 around the winter of 1980, january perhaps, i just got off work at 9:30 p.M. from the auto dealership. i was a car salesman at the time. i started driving towards the city of toronto, canada, on the qew (queen elizabeth way) eastbound to meet some friends at a bar on the esplanad (a street lined with nightclubs). i didn't have anything to drink and didn't smoke any pot on that day/evening. 

as i was driving, i noticed a string of lights slowly rotating counter clockwise over the city of toronto, at about the ten o'clock position from my point of view. this caught my eye because these formation of lights were very unusual. the lights were evidently in a circular pattern with about two thirds visible as the other third rotated out of view. imagine a pie plate with about 25 lights around the circumference of it. as this "pie plate" would revolve, a third of these lights would be hidden from view as if they were obstructed by a solid body. it was at night so all i could see was these rotating string of lights but they were definitely on a "fixed" platform as the lights were revolving in unison. 

although i've heard of ufo's and was curious, at that time in my life, i didn't really give that much thought about them. i've always been interested in nature and especially about the universe. i've seen all kinds of aircraft and advertising blimps at night before. i drove taxi's off and on for fifteen years on the night shift and have seen countless meteors, lightening, satellites etc. on two occasions i've even seen extremely bright, slow falling, green fireball meteors lighting up the ground, for a couple of seconds, as if it was daylight . i've read, in later years, were other witnesses reported green fireballs as ufo's. i chuckled to myself thinking how easily "ufo believers" can be fooled by natural phenomenon. 

anyway, these circle of lights were slowly descending and approaching towards me (westbound), while i was driving about 115 kilometers per hour on the highway (eastbound). these lights were getting closer and closer as "we" approached each other. i recall thinking to myself that this must be some kind of advertising balloon and those lights were letters. as i kept driving, i was paying more and more attention to this object because the closer it was getting, the more unusual it looked. i kept glancing at it, while driving, waiting until it was close enough to read what these letters were saying, still thinking it was some kind of advertising blimp. the closer it got, the more i looked at it. now at my nine o'clock position, the string of rotating lights appeared to started to bank left like an airplane would "turning right". actually it wasn't banking at all. it was dipping forward pointing towards the ground. at this point, i realized that these lights were not letters at all. they were different shaped, yellowish white lights. the reason these lights were different in shape was because they were "inset" into some solid body. when the lights were seen head on, they were circular. but as they rotated out of "direct" view, they changed shape like the different crescents of the moon. that's why they appeared to be all different shapes. 

during the time when this object started to bank left, or i thought from my point of view, i was struggling with myself trying to understand whether this was a plane, blimp, or a balloon. it was flying too slow for a plane, yet, too fast for a blimp. also, it didn't appear to be flying or floating. the best way i can describe it's motion is that it looked like it was "sailing" in the sky. 

what's interesting here is that the human brain tries to associate what the eyes are seeing, to something already seen or experienced before. that's why i was at war with myself trying to decide whether this object was a plane, blimp or a balloon. every time i resigned myself to what i must be witnessing, i jumped to another conclusion. this jumping from one conclusion to another occurred during the whole experience. i was imagining all kinds of things. for example, if it was a plane, the only way these lights could have been positioned was in a circle because this plane must have had some kind of supporting structure in a circle from wing tip to wing tip. this didn't make any sense at all. i've seen advertising planes before. this was nothing like this. not even close. than i was trying to imagine a "goodyear blimp" with these letters going across it's side. this was nothing like it either. so here i was, trying to drive and watch this object at the same time. as i was driving, i started to slow down because i kept looking at this circle of lights more than the road ahead of me. in retrospect, i don't even know how i kept my car on the road because i was so awed by this display in the sky. 

here is the killer. 

as the object kept dipping forward more and more, it eventually ended up totally perpendicular to the ground! the first thing that came to mind was a big ferris wheel rotating in the sky. at this point i slowed down to about 50 kph (30 miles an hour in a 60 mph highway for my american friends) and put my four way, flashing hazard lights on my car fearing that another car would crash into the back of me for going so slow on a 100 kph highway. 

here is another shocker. 

as i was mesmerized by this strange looking object, a surge of adrenaline hit me like a ton of bricks. i didn't realize how big this thing was. at first i thought it was the size of an airplane fairly close. it was gigantic! at least twice the size of a football field, bigger than an aircraft carrier!!! i don't know what gave away it's size. maybe the reflections of light on the ground. the best way i can relate this sudden realization is like one of those illusions most of us have seen. you know, when you look at a pixel drawing with an image you can't see until you stare at it for a while? after a period of time, you make out the face of a women or something like that? that's kind of the transformation i experienced. at first i thought the object was the size of a large plane than suddenly i really saw it. it was huge!!! i yelled out loud to my self, "holey f**k, it's huge!!!". i don't f***ing believe it, it's f***ing huge!!!. i thought it was fairly close at first, than bang!, it was much farther away and larger than my brain first comprehended it. speaking about this surge of adrenaline. have you ever had a really close call having a car accident? when your heart rate skyrockets to about 180 beats per minute? that's what i felt when i realized how gargantuan this object was! i could actually feel my heart pounding like crazy. to be frank, it literally scared the hell out of me, when i realized how big it was. at this point, i rolled down my window and pointed to this giant "ferris wheel" in the sky to the other motorists, but it appeared no one seemed to notice as they screamed by me at regular highway speeds. i remember how cold it was when i rolled down my window. it was something like minus 30 celsius below zero. 

after, i don't know how long, probably only a few seconds of rotating in this perpendicular position, this thing started to climb and right itself and "sail" back to the direction it originally came from. i rolled up my window, turned off my hazard lights, and started to speed up to chase it. still it seemed other motorists didn't notice this object. it still irks me to this day. as i was approaching the city limits, this object was in it's flat position again climbing over the city. then, all of a sudden, the rotating lights turned off except for a red "aircraft like" blinking light (which i never noticed before). after a few seconds, the rotating lights turned on again. it was like in the movie "close encounters of the third kind". the lights just blasted on. than after a few seconds they turned off again as it seemed to be right over the city. strange behavior. now i was exiting off of the highway on to spadina rd. i lost track of these lights because of the tall buildings. when i was on the street where i was going, i saw a cop parked on the other side of the road writing a parking ticked. i stopped in the middle of the road and ran over to him. he was quite taken aback by my seemingly aggressive approach. i asked him, "how long have you been here?" i forgot what he said, but i asked, "did you see that big circle of lights flying in the sky? he said "no". after parking my car, i met my friends at the bar, "baily's", and told them what happened but they didn't take me seriously as they've already had a few and were more interested in the ladies. 

after sitting at the bar by myself for a couple of hours i went home. i was living at my parent's house at the time, temporarily, so when i got home around 1 a.M., i called the police. i didn't know who else to phone at the time. they didn't take me seriously of course so after that, i phoned the toronto international airport and managed to get through to air traffic control and asked them if they had anyone call in with a ufo report. nothing. so i called the police again and convinced them to take me seriously as i wanted to make a report. they told me they can send a couple of officers to my house. as it was late and my parents were asleep, i told them i'd rather come to the station the next day to report. next morning, when i contemplated going in i decided not to, fearing they would think i'm some kind of wacko. 

as the days went by, scanning the newspapers looking for a "ufo sighting" to no avail, i started doubting myself. i was trying to convince myself that perhaps i was somehow mistaken. maybe it was something not out of the ordinary at all. maybe it was a balloon or airplane of some kind. maybe like thousands of others, i witnessed something that i misinterpreted for something else. 

and now the conclusion. 

about a week or so later, on or about the tenth page of the toronto star, bottom right hand corner, there it was! a short article. "dozens of mississauga residents reported a ufo as big as a football field!!!" i don't recall the whole article. "finally" i said to myself. "i knew it was real", "i knew i didn't imagine this". i'll never, ever, doubt myself again no matter how much ridicule i'll be subjected to. i have only one regret however. that is i wish i had others with me to experience this. after about 27 years, i just had to let this out. 

tibor blank
content.summary: Gigantic circle of lights, on a fixed platform, twice the size of a football field!

content.detailedDescription: I was folding laundry when i saw this bright light comming through the curtins in the kitchen. i went outside and saw a disk shapped object hovering above the chicken coop in my back lot. it was there for the better part of an hour. it was seen by all my neighbores. this happened a very long time ago and i wonder if anyone else would have seen it. i know that others in my area saw it because it was all over the cb radio back then people say they saw a glowing disk over my house. it was even with my son upstairs window. he was little at the time but said he remebered seeing the light and wondering what it was. it was so bright that it woke him up. he never got out of bed to look at it. it made a humming sound as it rose up in the air. i think it was attracked to the green glowing light coming from the chicken house. i am an old woman now and i thought i would tell someone about it before i died.
content.summary: Disk shaped object over my chicken coop

content.detailedDescription:
dear mufon: this photo was taken on january 10, 2009 with a camera phone while i was hiking with a friend in san diego county.  the ufo appeared briefly,hovered and then vanished just as i took the picture.  if you zoom in on the picture, you can see electrical discharge coming out of the high-power lines below the ufo. i have seen other ufo's in san diego but only at night , this one was up close in broad daylight and scared the heck out of me!!! i sent this photo to coast to coast if you need more info please contact me @ {pid} thank you for your time...Richard



{cms/jat/pid}
content.summary: I was hiking and the ufo came up over some power lines.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 3 pm i walked outside to smoke a cigarette and happened to be looking towards some appartment houses and i noticed an undefined blimp like object with undefined shapes. it was extremly shiny metal object with a part black rounded undefined side or rear. the object came down on a low angle of descent with no noise and disappeared behind some homes. the weathet conditions were sunny with some very thin cirrus clouds. i tourned and walked the other way and tought it was just some balloon. then i tought that has to be a big balloon, relative to the distance and size of the object. i turned again and to my supprise the object started to lift slowly from behind the homes. i knew then that since the object came down then after 30-45 seconds it was lifting up straight at increasing speed and since it was slightly windy it did not deviate from it's trajectory it could not have been a baloon or small blimp. as the object was ascending it kept increasing in speed actually going beyond a thin cloud, then when the clod moved the object was a little shiny spec in the sky untill it disappeared. no noise of any sort was noticed from the object, no noticeble lights were seen, no shaking from the object was noticed and no course changes. the descend and ascent were dea center perfect! i do not know what this object was and i checked for any other reports in the area with the local police and nothing was reported. i was wondering if you could shed some light on this phenomena, i do not think it was any known aircraft or blimp or ballons they just do not land and go straight up again at incredible speed. we are not close to any weather stations or labs or governament installations that i know of.

thank you.

jerry
content.summary: Object unknown.

content.detailedDescription:
This event happened a few years ago so unfortunately, not everything is clear. however, i remember the following vividly. 
i was young and in my old house. i happened to be watching tv like every other weekday night around 7 or 8 o'clock. i happened to feel inclined to look out my window (i used to do this because i liked how the sun set over the tree line that borders my neighborhood) and to my surprise, there was something i was not used to seeing. i was captivated by what i call my first ufo. 
the object was silhouetted by the sunset and as a result was a dark grey/black-ish color. i could however discern that it was metallic as there was some reflection of the sunlight off of it as it hovered. there were no lights, no sounds, and no other physical signs of its presence besides that it was floating there. i pondered what it could be: the sky was clear so i knew it was not some kind of cloud or other weather-related phenomena.  however, it looked like a classic disk shaped craft i have so classically heard about being a ufo. this one had two unique distinctions: it had a tail rudder (similar to that on a commercial jet) and bubble canopy (or cockpit like structure). i knew it was not a jet or other aircraft however, because it was hovering (and it was not a helicopter because there were no rotors or moving parts anywhere on it!). i even considered the possibility that if it was a jet, it could be flying away from or towards me but i ruled this out because the craft did not shrink or grow in visible size as is the effect when something moves towards/from one's vantage point. then, unexpectedly, the craft turned in place!! what i mean by this is that it did not move its position in the x,y,z plane, but it banked (tilted to one side) and then rotated, in place, facing a different direction. i knew it was facing a different direction, because i could no longer see the distinct "tail" anymore. i called my younger sister over and she saw it for a brief second too. we turned to look at each other in confusion and when we turned back, the craft had vanished! there was no trace it had ever been there - no smoke, no residue, no sound. i have never seen anything like this before!
i will include a drawing on ms paint but excuse the poor quality for i am no artist.
content.summary: I was in my family room looking outside and it was hovering over the tree line.

content.detailedDescription: Driving on sr417, noticed a orange fireball, estimate 5-10ft in diameter, speed at about 100 mph, east to west trajectory, 60deg angle of entry into lake howell.
content.summary: Orange ball.

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling south on rte 422 from oaks to king of prussia area when what we thought was an airplane (but no "normal" airplane lights like they are supposed to have)about to crass crossed over head of our car, low, quiet, with one very bright white light shining. it angled down towards the ground like going to land. i could just see the outline (teardrop shaped) of the top of the vessel. my husband was watching it also, i was driving but could not help but notice it and watch it. it passed over our head, dipped at an angle towards the ground, then just disappeared from our sight. we both saw the light go out, but no noise, no crash, no thud,no fire, no lights come back out, and just like that it disappeared into the dark night sky. it was around what the call "st gabe's curve" on route 422, because there is a "saint gabriel's boy's school"   there right off 422. we drove around that area the next day but there are many fields and private areas and no evidence could be seen to us from driving around in our car. there were other cars on route 422 at the time of the incident, but we did not stop, nor did anyone else. there was no place to pull over. we wereon our way to meet our son-in-law's aunt near philadelphia. we told her the whole story when we got there.
content.summary: Passed over our car, dropping fast; bright light  went out suddenly.

content.detailedDescription:
In brazil, there is a city called itatira in ceara state. it's a city with 17.000 people.

the entire city is in panic because there is a light since november 2008 following up the city people at night.

there are more than 100 reports. people are afraid to leave their houses during the night time.

fishermen stopped to fish because they are in panic.

the brazilian intelligence agency is starting to research all the facts.

a girl took a picture of the light that is following the people during the night time.

i'm sending this picture for you attached.

there are people saying to the newspapers that they got ill after they saw the light.

so, that's a new case that needs to be searched.
content.summary: Itatira city is in panic - lights are following the population at night.

content.detailedDescription: August 1960.  i was in the u.S. air force stationed at raf chicksands, chicksands priory, bedfordshire, england. on august 12th, the u.S. had launched the echo 1a communications satellite (actually it was a great big mylar balloon that reflected radio signals). it was big enough to be visible to the naked eye. a few days later, some of my co-workers and i got the times and positions in the sky where echo would be visible in our part of the world. we went outside to watch for echo and were watching the spot where it would come up over the horizon. right on time, there it was! and it had a friend, a fellow traveler. there were two bright specks moving across the sky, not just one. they passed directly overhead. then one of them made a 180 degree turn and went back the way it had come. we went to the coffee shop and discussed what we had seen, but no one had any idea what it might have been.
content.summary: Unidentified object paces echo 1a communications satellite.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were out walking our dogs for the evening i was looking at the sky as i always do, when i noticed a light blinking at about 30 to 40 degrees above the horizion.   i stoped and fixed my vision on it to watch for movement, it seemed to stay in one place as if hovering bobbing up and down and sideways, in a few moments my wife came up beside me and we watched it togather.   she returned the dogs back home and came back in about 10 min. she stated that she could not see it until she was standing where i was, we moved from side to side and noticed that when we moved a few feet side to side we couldn't see it.   we watched it for about an hour and at that time i decided to phone the police, 2 officers came out and said that they were going to look to see if they could findout what it was.   the night was overcast so i've ruled out a star.....We do have a naval air station it's for flight training and they don't go out on sundays.   i went out this evening and it is there again same place so i'm a little bit puzzled by this none the less i again contacted the police, the officer that came out stated that the to officers that came out on the 25 and wittnessed this couldn't fine anything.   thankyou and please if you have any questions contact me.
content.summary: Flashing white light bobbing up and down and sideways....Lights strobing.

content.detailedDescription:
Saw redish light in distance between jenny lind area and lodi.  light was almost still and just over the horizon, and slowly lowering.  upon viewing in scope it looked like it twice shifted to a half sphere with lights on the bottom edge. (not a great scope)  it descended slowly until its view was blocked by a hill.  looked to be about half way to lodi at the edge of where the foothills start.  

no rapid movements.  no blinking lights.  too large to be a helicopter and too slow for an airplane.
content.summary: Redish color, minor shifting.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the stars and in front of me in the night sky was a bright light bigger than a star or planet that really twinkled a lot. too  much for a star. i thought it was maybe a plane at first beacuase i could see red and blue lights. but it didn't move steadly across the sky like a plane would. it moved somewhat slowly, very little distance up and down. i got my binocualrs to see it better and there definetly was a red light on the left and the right side seemed to turn-there was a blue lght but it looked like it might be longer-cylindar in shape and there seemed to be four blue lights in a row but it was difficult to tell for sure. i watched it for 10-15 minutes and then went to the bathroom. i had been looking at it from sliding glass doors and when i came back it had moved to the right the distance of the width of one of the doors-3 feet. i watched it some more and it slowly would move more to the right. eventually it started to appear smaller. there were no clouds to obscure it. as i watched it kept getting smaller, like it was moving farther away and then disappeared. it looked just like the pictures on the ufo hunters show of the bright lights with colored lights. exactly like that. there might have been another one to the left of that one but i wasn't really watching that. there is no doubt that it was a ufo to me. i live out in the country and not a lot around so the nights are very clear and you can see the stars clearly and this wasn't a star. stars don't move three feet in a matter of a few minutes. also, on july 4, 1976 in boise idaho a friend and i saw three lights in a triangle shape that moved in unison. they looked like they would come closer and then back away-also moved sideways. i have heard that idaho seems to have a lot of ufo sightings/esperiences.
content.summary: Bright light in the sky at night. twinkled too much for a star. red light on left and blue on right. moved around slowly then 3 feet quickly.

content.detailedDescription:
Went out for a smoke. saw small plane rise through the clouds.(could tell itwas plane by it's lights) could also hear propeller. as the plane went out of sight icould see this redish ball of pulsating light come right under ware the plane went into the clouds. as the sound of plane faded the redish ball(that i 1st thought was another plane) did not have any sound at all. it started to turn in the direction of plane. than i thaught the plane must of just missed this ball.After i realised what i just saw i homed in on red flashing ball closer. they we'r too close to each other. lost plane lights in clouds but red ball was at cloud celeing and just"floating about" no stright lines, no set altatuide.Objet then moving faster to the east northeast getting faster until it stopped pulsing and was gone. it was no star,plane,metor,swamp gas,reflection              
                          two weeks ago two c-130s northbound to niagra falls we'r over flying a simaler object. the'r were alot of jets around that night and this object and it was as big as c-130s i could hear the turboprops racing to cover object. hope you all the best.
                                  
                                             good luck
                                          mr. d. buffalo ny
content.summary: Redish ball , w/odd blinking light. not an airplane!

content.detailedDescription:
I work 00:00 to 07:30, and have breaks at 02:00,04:00 and 06:00.On friday morning at 06:00, i was outside on break. it was a clear morning and the sun wasn't coming up yet. i was looking at the sky enjoying a clear morning when i saw a starlike object moving at faster than ordinary aircraft but not outstandingly fast. the object was moving from the south-east to the north-west,not on path to any local airports. i plotted where gtr.Pittsburgh int'l airport and allegheny county airports where,and this object deffinitely was neither heading for or coming from either.
 local air traffic typically heads north-east to south west for either airport and is ussually low enough to discern typical nav.Lights and you can hear the engines.
 this same type of object was seen at the same location mid august heading directly south to north for 4 nights.On 2 back to back nights 2 objects were seen together.On the first sighting 2 were in a loose formation flying side by side with the "wingman" casually passing "lead" as they passed overhead. the second sighting they stayed together,3rd and 4th night there was a single object.
 around october,another sighting of the same type of object was seen,this time traveling north to south. on one occassion,the object was heading south,then made a course change of about 45deg.Toward the south-east from one star to another and continued straight south.
 the times of the august sightings was between 02:05 and 02:10 and in october,between 04:15 and 04:25.
 during the august sightings,myself and other co-workings were just enjoying the clear nights and watching for shooting stars,and learning the constellations.We were looking at one constellation when i asked "hey are those stars moving?" that's when the first 2 passed overhead with the one passing the other. then we were joking that they were chinese satellites checking up on us.
 my first impression was that they were satellites, but never heard of 2 side by side like that,then i thought they were high flyers,but gtr pitt was to the south west and they typically wouldn't fly over us in this manner.
  the location of the sightings is 40.41823/79.75649
content.summary: Saw starlike object at work in early morning moving s.E. - n.W.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a bright summer mid day and i was playing in my yard, in a very rural, country area in ny about fifty miles north of nyc.  i was about ten years old.  all of a sudden i heard a very loud roar coming from the sky.  i looked up and saw flashing lights that were moving on either side of what i at first presumed to be an airplane.  the flashing lights, (about six to eight separate shapes on each side), stayed higher in the sky than the flying object.  the spaceship, (i'll call it that), came closer to the ground and to me.   the noise was so loud i couldn't believe my mother didn't come running out of the house to see what was going on!  when the spaceship got directly over me it came down so low i fell to the ground.  it was gun metal grey and shaped very much like a rocket.   it had a band  or a wide piece of metal with holes in it, around the middle that turned and went click with each turn.  i had the very clear impression that it was taking pictures of me.  it hovered over me as this was going on and it didn't move.  then with a whoosh it took off and just disappeared it a matter of seconds over the hill.
i just lay on the grass stunned for a minute or so trying to figure out what i had seen.  i ran in the house and told my mom i just saw a very strange airplane that didn't have any wings, that it came down very low and was very loud.  my mom was busy canning tomatoes and told me she heard it but she didn't have time for me and told me to go back out and play.
it wasn't until i got older and heard about ufo sightings that i finally realized what i had seen.

it scared me then and it scares me now because i have believed all of my life that "they" have pictures of me.  i am now seventy two years old and i would love to see some sort of resolution.   so many sightings, so much written and catalogued.   i would like to know what have we seen?   have we really had visitors from other solar systems?  will we ever know?  i would like to know before i die.

this is the first time i have reported this sighting,  but i remember it as if it happened yesterday.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Roaring rocket like grey metallic flying object came out of nowhere, hovered, clicked and left very quickly.  flashing lights accompanied aircraft on either side but stayed high in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying in bed with my husband, and witnessed something in the shape of a sort of spider, on a tripod. it was after i got done watching tv around 2:30am est, and i went to bed in our upstairs bedroom.
as i got into bed, as soon as i shut my eyes, i heard my cat jumping at the door to come back in for the night. upon opening my eyes, i saw this thing, hovering in the air, at the foot of our bed. it was black in color,with an oval shaped body,and billowy legs. it was attached to a black tripod, that was circular at the base. it measured approximately 2 to 2 1/2 feet in width, and 2 to 2 1/2 feet tall. i could see it quite clearly because my daughter slept with her ceiling light on , and the light from her room shown into our room, and made it quite visible.
i just layed there in shock, i couldn't move. my eyes stayed fixed on it, till finally it started gliding across the length of our bed very slowly.
then it went thru the wall that the head of our bed was against.
as it was going thru the wall, i could see it until the very tips of its legs were gone. my heart was pounding so hard, i thought it was going to beat thru my chest, yet i couldn't move until it was gone. 
i proceeded to get up to let the cat in, then i quickly got back into bed, and pulled the blankets up over my head.
the next morning, i told my husband and other people about what happened to me that previous nite. they all laughed at me, and they insisted that i must have been dreaming. but i know what i saw, andi know that i was wide awake when this all happened.
it took me 45 years to get the courage to tell my story again, because of all the ridicule i faced the first time i told it. what i'm looking for now is to find another person who might have seen this thing.
content.summary: I was laying in bed with my husband, and witnessed something in the shape of a sort of spider, on a tripod.

content.detailedDescription:
mi nombre es {pid}, vivo cerca al aeropuerto jorge chavez en lima - per���, conozco la trayectoria de los aviones en el cielo, de los que despegan, los que aterrizan y los que pasan sobre la ciudad de lima.

   puedo reconocer un avi���n desde lejos sin temor a confundirlo con cualquier otro objeto celeste u otro tipo de avi���n, las luces de estos y su velocidad son muy caracter���sticos para mi persona.

  como siempre subi a mi azotea para refrescarme por el incesante calor, tipico del verano en callao-lima, meses de diciembre a marzo. siempre me quedo a la mitad de la escalera para que no me de el viento de frente. tengo una vista libre del cielo en un ���ngulo de 280 grados.
  
  siempre miro las estrellas ya que se ven estrellas fugaces y porque de ni���o tambi���n he tenido 3 avistamientos de ovnis. 

  eran alrededor de las 00:10 hrs. del 26.Ene.2009 y de pronto en direccion sur-este observo a los lejos una c���mulo de nube, fue mi primera impresion, la cual se acercaba en direcci���n nor-oeste a gran velocidad y esto me llamo la atenci���n. de un momento esta nube se perfile de lado/costado (es como tener una visi���n de un avi���n desde arriba o de abajo) y eran luces en forma de un ave fenix. las luces no son muy brillantes, son luces d���biles pero forman una muy definida figura.

  para esto habian pasado cerca de 8 seg. luego de los cuales nuevamente el ovni cambia a direccion norte y puedo ver siempre de lado/costado, la forma de ave fenix que tiene. me quedo sorprendido y le paso la voz a mi esposa, quien ya estaba durmiendo, en un cuarto contiguo en cual tiene ventana a la escalera. le dije que suba rapido que hab���an ovnis. 

   estaba en ese momento en el dilema de correr por mi c���mara digital o la manual y tomar fotos. pero sabia que la observaci���n no iba a durar mucho y que la perder���a.

   ya hab���an transcurrido cerca de 14 seg., y mi esposa me pregunta, si a���n se pod���an ver los ovnis, le digo que ya no suba porque estaban en direcci���n al mar. en ese lapso de tiempo que mi esposa estaba preguntandome sobre los ovnis, ���stos estaban cambiando ligeramente de trayectoria hacia el norte y luego de 1 seg. retornar���an a su trayectoria nor-oeste, de haber continuado en esa trayectoria norte hubiera pasado por encima de mi casa.

   en ese momento el/los ovnis cambian a direcci���n oeste internandose en el horizonte y cambiando su forma de lado/costado a horizontal. en la vista del horizonte pude observar que estaba zigzageando de derecha a izquierda todo el conjunto de luces sin perder su forma.

   lo curioso es que pasado 10 seg. de la observaci���n despego un avi���n desde el aeropuerto. al parecer en el aeropuerto no hab���an detectado en sus radares a este c���mulo de objetos, por ello me quede mas sorprendido ya que si el avi���n hubiera despegado 20 segundos antes, entonces el ovni habr���a tenido que esquivar al avi���n.

   en total la observaci���n la estimo en 20 seg.

{cms/jat/pid} text moved to narrative
content.summary: Ovnis en formacion de un ave fenix.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a flyers game heading west on rt. 422 just past the trooper rd. exit and before the oaks exit on the straight part before "st. gabe's curve" at approximately 10:07 pm with my 14 year old daughter.  the sky was clear and ahead of me in the sky was this very bright, low, pulsating or flickering object.  at first i thought it was the front headlights of a plane, but it was way lower and brighter than anything else in the sky including other planes and lower than i have ever seen a plane at night in that area. after a few seconds, i realized that it didn't seem to be moving like a plane and that i couldn't see the "plane's" red or green colored wing lights which i would have seen if it had been heading to phila. airport.  so i said outloud to my daughter, "is that a really bright star ahead of us?".  since i was driving, and there were cars ahead of us i needed to focus on the road and only occasionally glance up.  i asked her to look at it as we were approaching the "st. gabe's curve" and the object would be closest to us out my driver's window to the left at that point.  it seemed rather stationary and it was hard to judge the distance away that it was in the sky or what town it was directly over.  the closer that we came to it, it appeared to me to be sort of diamond shaped and pulsating or blinking continuously.  i think some of the cars ahead of me saw it too as they put on their brakes and slowed down for no other reason such as a deer crossing or road hazard.  my daughter told me that it looked like it had a smaller more faint light on the side of it, but that all of the lights were a golden color, not white.  she thought it was the space station.  i have seen the space station pass by at night and i knew that this was not the space station as it didn't move and it was much bigger.  we continued on our way home, with the light eventually getting behind us and out of our line of vision..  i can't get the vision of it out of my head.  i am convinced that i saw a ufo.  since that night, i heard on the radio and tv the day after my sighting, that there have been a higher than usual number of sightings in the county just north of me (bucks) and i started to feel like i wasn't crazy.  then i saw the video of the strange object over the inauguration ceremony and i wondered if that had anything to do with what i saw.  i sent in a post to the philly examiner as i read online at that site that the night before in silverdale, pa someone took a picture of what looked an awful lot like what i saw.  i kick myself for not pulling over and taking a picture of what i saw as i did have my camera with me since we were coming from the game.  i hope someone can validate for me just what it was that i saw.
content.summary: A large, bright, pulsating light was seen at a very low altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
I've seen a similar object several times over the past year or so in the same general area while i'm at home and usually after i've turned off the tv and gone upstairs to go to bed.  it's always been later in the evening that i've noticed the strange, hovering lights.

because of the recent news of sightings in bucks county, pa (which is the next county over), i looked at the sky again last night which was mostly clear.  in the distance was something that looked like a star at first glance, but it didn't stay still like a star, it sort of stayed steady, but then would drop a bit or move around a bit, but not much.  it also seemed to have colored blinking lights.  it seems to stay in the same place for a long time and i'm usually so tired i go to bed without investigating farther.  i can't tell if it's close or far, but i do know that it's about the size of a brighter star from my vantage point.

i've seen this before on many occasions.  i even hold my head steady on the window so that my eyes aren't fooling me with a perceived motion of the object.  i need to get a video camera ready with a tripod (but then my husband would think i'm crazy!).

i am curious to know if anyone else is seeing this in our area and if anyone else can take a look.  like i said, i see it often, but i'm not really into these kinds of things so i ignore it and put it out of my mind.  what's strange is i've seen it so often and usually in approximately the same place.  the movement of it really has me concerned.

i don't remember how i first noticed it because it's been a while - maybe when i let the dogs out at night i may have thought it strange because it wasn't moving like a plane.
content.summary: Hovering, star with blinking lights.

content.detailedDescription: My son dad had picked up for a visit and my aunt uncle three cousins and my daughter and i decided to go to cedar key fl for dinner. we took the short cut across country my uncle knew instead of the long way down us.19 from chiefland fl. to cedar key. the trip there was uneventful and we were all in good spirits. we had dinner and were on our way back home. the sun had gone down while we had dinner, it was approximately 830 to 930 when we finally finished dinner and got back to the car. every one was enjoying themselves.    on our way home we were joking around and suddenly the lights on the dash of the car blinked out and the engine of the car stopped.  my uncle was perplexed as to what had happoned, you see he is a machanic and took very good care of his car.   it seemed as suddenly as the lights and the engine had gone off they came back on again.   i jokingly told my aunt that this is what happoned when you had an encounter with aliens. your car lights go off and the engine stops.  she replied " dont say that" we continued on home.  at the time it seemed we had returned in a timely fashon.  but over the years i began to realize that instead there was a possability that we had returned maybe an hour later than we were supposed to.( missing time, i'm not sure) but it did register that we should have returned at least an hour earlier than we did. no one mentioned it and neither did i.  but it has always stuck in the back of my mind.  we got home and did not even turn on the tv, we all got ready and went to bed after saying our goodnights. as we had to be at work the next morning.  i drove a silage truck and my uncle was a machanic on the same job, we rode back and forth to work together.     no one seemed to have any adverse effects, from the incident. only good memories of going out to dinner and having a good time..
content.summary: the car lights engine suddenly shut off , and then started up again as mysteriously as it had shut off.

content.detailedDescription: I was having dinner and suddenly i heard many of the neighbor dogs were barking at the same time  so i looked outside my window and i saw three or four blinking white lights, i thought it was a plane but it didn't move at all and doesn't have green and red lights like an usual airplane
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw very unusual lights in the sky over perth, au.

content.detailedDescription:
Immediately after this happened i wrote this account of the event:

---
at about 3:45 am on january 7th 2009 i went out my back door to smoke. i admired how bright the moon was. as i watched the moon i realized that it was an odd shape. it became clear that the moon was being covered in part by a sharply defined very black area. no light whatsoever appeared from behind this area. the moon grew smaller and smaller until it completely disappeared. it seemed very bizarre that such a bright moon had vanished completely. there were still a few thin horizontal clouds that were illuminated. then the moon began to emerge from the bottom of the black area again, visible only where it intersected with the illuminated cloud. i could see that the moon was also disappearing behind another black patch directly below the first. i grabbed my camera and took several pictures until such time as the moon completely disappeared again behind this second black patch. this had happened by about 4:00 am. shortly after the horizontal clouds dissipated and the moon did not return again. there is a mountain in this area, but the moon disappeared twice in an area of the sky much higher than this mountain. i will take a picture from the same angle when the sun comes up to illustrate where the mountain ridge actually is from this perspective. - 4:24 am january 7th 2009
---

the pictures i took of this have already been forwarded to mr. jones of mufon in utah.
content.summary: Moon disappears, reappears and disappears again. not an eclipse.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo deploying analglyph 3d technology (same as 3d movies: who would have thought).  you need 3d glasses to view aliens looking out ufo window in last picture.  stare long and hard at that last picture in video.

enclosed is video composed from original shots, and zipped up several of the original normal light evening shots of ufos in one file for research purposes.
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down interstate 95 under conditions of dense traffic. at the first appearance of the ufo my first thoughts were that it was two parking lot light builds attached to a tall pole. the ufo appeared under circumstances of murky air. the air was dark and thick like a fog and so the craft was hard to make-up. it appeared to glide across the sky at a constant rate of speed and glided right above my car giving us a look at its underside. it continued to float across the night sky at a constant state of speed until it left our view of the horizen. the best way for me to describe the way the craft appeared is by enclosing this link of a uav.

http://www.Thaitechnics.Com/aircraft/tg2/uav_predator2.Jpg
content.summary: It appeared as a uav (unmanned air vehicle).
